00029 from PyQt4.QtGui import *
00030 
00031 #
00032 # GTK -> KDE Icons mapping
00033 # Due to the fact that the server expects the client to understand GTK icon names
00034 # we used a set of two functions and a dictionary to help us work correctly.
00035 # The 'mapIcons' dictionary should have an entry for each icon name used by 
00036 # the server, the value of the entry is the name of the image in our resource
00037 # file. Simply use kdeIcon() and kdePixmap() functions to get the appropiate 
00038 # Icon or Pixmap.
00039 mapIcons = {
00040         'gtk-apply' : 'apply.png',
00041         'gtk-cancel' : 'cancel.png',
00042         'gtk-close' : 'close.png',
00043         'gtk-convert' : 'convert.png',
00044         'gtk-dialog-info' : 'info.png',
00045         'gtk-execute' : 'exec.png',
00046         'gtk-go-back' : 'previous.png',
00047         'gtk-go-forward' : 'next.png',
00048         'gtk-indent': 'indent.png',
00049         'gtk-info' : 'info.png',
00050         'gtk-jump-to' : 'relate.png',
00051         'gtk-media-next' : 'media_next.png',
00052         'gtk-media-pause' : 'pause.png',
00053         'gtk-media-previous' : 'media_previous.png',
00054         'gtk-ok' : 'ok.png',
00055         'gtk-print' : 'print.png',
00056         'STOCK_CONVERT' : 'convert.png',
00057         'STOCK_EXECUTE' : 'action.png',
00058         'STOCK_INDENT' : 'rightjust.png',
00059         'STOCK_JUSTIFY_FILL' : 'text_block.png',
00060         'STOCK_NEW' : 'new.png',
00061         'STOCK_OPEN' : 'folder.png',
00062         'STOCK_PREFERENCES' : 'configure.png',
00063         'STOCK_PRINT' : 'print.png',
00064         'STOCK_SELECT_COLOR' : 'colorpicker.png',
00065         'terp-graph' : 'chart.png',
00066         'terp-partner' : 'partner.png',
00067         'terp-account' : 'account.png',
00068         'terp-hr' : 'hr.png',
00069         'terp-product' : 'product.png',
00070         'terp-graph' : 'chart.png',
00071         'terp-stock' : 'stock.png',
00072         'terp-crm' : 'crm.png',
00073         'terp-purchase' : 'purchase.png',
00074         'terp-mrp' : 'mrp.png',
00075         'terp-sale' : 'sale.png',
00076         'terp-administration' : 'administration.png',
00077         'terp-project': 'clock.png',
00078         'terp-calendar': 'calendar.png',
00079         'reload': 'reload.png'
00080 }
00081 
00082 ## @brief Returns a QIcon given an icon name. The name of the icon is usually a 
00083 # GTK or OpenERP name.
00084 def kdeIcon(icon):
00085         if icon in mapIcons:
00086                 return QIcon( ':/images/' + mapIcons[icon] )
00087         else:
00088                 if icon:
00089                         print "KDE ICON '%s' NOT FOUND" % icon
00090                 return QIcon()
00091 
00092 ## @brief Returns a QPixmap given an icon name. The name of the icon is usually 
00093 # a GTK or OpenERP name.
00094 def kdePixmap(icon):
00095         if icon in mapIcons:
00096                 return QPixmap( ':/images/' + mapIcons[icon] )
00097         else:
00098                 if icon:
00099                         print "KDE ICON '%s' NOT FOUND" % icon
00100                 return QPixmap()
